text: Thanks to her former modeling career, First Lady Melania Trump can turn even the most casual outfit into a major fashion moment. Since arriving in Washington, D. C., in January 2017, she has consistently wowed Us with her style choices, as she takes cues from former trendsetting First Ladies like Jackie Kennedy and embraces high - fashion designs.
